item.title: Podcast Channel Manager - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a Podcast Channel Manager to oversee the day-to-day operations of our podcast channel. As a Channel Manager, you will be responsible for curating and scheduling podcast episodes, managing content distribution, and engaging with the audience on various platforms. This role requires excellent organizational skills, strong attention to detail, and a passion for podcasts.

  Responsibilities:
• Editing podcast  episodes svideos to expected quality standards
• Optimize video titles, descriptions, and tags for SEO and audience engagement
• Implement best practices for thumbnails and metadata
• Create visually appealing transcripts
• Reels creation
• Schedule and manage video releases in YouTube and Kujabi
• Monitor and respond to comments
• Analyse performance metrics
• Use data to make informed decisions about content and audience growth strategies
• Implement SEO
• Explore and create proposals and implement upon approval, monetization options (sponsorships, adds etc)



  Skills:
  - Strong knowledge of the podcast industry and trends
  - Excellent organizational and time management skills
  - Proficient in audio and video editing software
  - Familiarity with podcast hosting platforms
- SEO knowledge
  - Social media management and marketing experience

  Size: Medium
  Duration: 3 to 6 months
  Expertise: Intermediate

Budget: $600
Posted On: June 27, 2024 05:07 UTC
Category: Audio Editing
Skills:Podcast, Social Media Management, Audio Editing, Project Management, Video Editing, SEO Keyword Research
Skills: Podcast, Social Media Management, Audio Editing, Project Management, Video Editing, SEO Keyword Research
Country: United Arab Emirates
click to apply

item.description:

item.title: I Need a Stock Footage Video Creator - Upwork
item.description:
I need someone who can take short-form content that is already created, strip the video off of it and overlay it with RELEVANT stock footage instead.

You may use AI for this. We can pay $1 per completed video (clips are 20 - 50 seconds long each). We usually push over batches of 50 to 100 at at time.

NO captions are needed for these clips.

Heres a sample of the short form videos you'll be converting
https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLyueBEcPr_tx8RHgqY3xjoWFWyKZ6tdBJ

PLEASE DO NOT CONTACT OUR CLIENT. Only way to contact us AND get considered for this is by applying through upwork. Any other way will get ignored. Thanks

Budget: $60
Posted On: June 27, 2024 05:00 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing
Skills: Video Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Tik tok monthly manager - Upwork
item.description:
Ok i need a monthly tik tok social media manager who can grow my following on tik tok. You will also need to be able to create videos and content to get me click and views so that i can make money on tik tok. You also need to be able to promote my affiliate products. The end of the job i should have followers and views and engagement and made money on tik tok. You need to be able to make videos and edit them and make logos and banners. You will need to make my tik tok account popular and get sales to my affiliate website and signups

Budget: $11
Posted On: June 27, 2024 04:41 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:Social Media Marketing Strategy, Social Media Management, Social Media Marketing, Social Media Content Creation, Social Media Content, Marketing Strategy
Skills: Social Media Marketing Strategy, Social Media Management, Social Media Marketing, Social Media Content Creation, Social Media Content, Marketing Strategy
Country: United States
